text: hi I'm Seamus Mullen I'm the chef and
owner of trattoria restaurant and I'm
going to show you some really cool
tricks using a grill we've got this
amazing grill here but if you don't have
something as fancy as this there's still
a lot of stuff you can do at home one of
my favourite things are doing the grill
is hot smoking hot smoking is literally
when you're using smoke and heat as a
medium for cooking anything whether it's
vegetables or protein and if you've got
a grill that's got racks on it or
shelves on it even better because then
you can moderate the temperature I'm
going to show you how to smoke a whole
suckling pig but of course if you don't
have a whole pig at home there's lots of
other things you can do and let me show
you how to do some tomatoes as well so
let's go check out what's going on
inside the grill so I've got couple of
suckling pigs here and what we've done
is we've stacked them from the bigger
cuts of meat to the more delicate cuts
at the top and that'll get the big cuts
of meat cooked all the way through and
then the delicate ones are just gently
cooking we're gonna let those go for a
couple of hours we check them again so
obviously we got the Regal Pig here but
you can also do something as simple as
the humble tomato and this is a really
really great trick to do at home I just
have some roma tomatoes that have been
cut up marinated with a little bit of
olive oil salt and pepper I'm doing this
in a what we call Hotel pan but you can
do it in anything anything that's
perforated that's the most important
part but it's got holes in it so the
smoke will come through and then these
Tomatoes you can puree them and you can
make a sauce you can use them for
vinaigrette you could just have them as
they are let's just stick them up here
and let them hang out there really
slowly and get a whole bunch of flavor
so we moderate the temperature by adding
more wood or coals to the fire and that
allows us to get smoke you see the smoke
going up that's what gives a lot of
flavor so we've got pigs
we got Tomatoes we could throw some fish
we could throw in any kind of vegetable
maybe a chicken you can put that in your
grill and smoke it what are you smoking
at home leave me a comment below and let
me know and don't forget to subscribe to
the bone Appetit Channel
